mil6.1.6:1.2_0: ‘arahā ekaṁ vedanaṁ vedayati kāyikaṁ, na cetasikan’ti.
mil6.1.6:1.3_1: arahato cittaṁ yaṁ kāyaṁ nissāya pavattati,
mil6.1.6:1.5_1: yaṁ so sakacittassa pavattamāne kāye anissaro hoti assāmī avasavattī;
mil6.1.6:1.6_0: sakuṇopi tāva, bhante, yasmiṁ kulāvake paṭivasati,
mil6.1.6:1.6_1: tattha so issaro hoti sāmī vasavattī”ti.
mil6.1.6:2.1_1: kāyānugatā dhammā bhave bhave kāyaṁ anudhāvanti anuparivattanti.
mil6.1.6:2.3_0: Sītaṁ uṇhaṁ jighacchā pipāsā uccāro passāvo middhaṁ jarā byādhi maraṇaṁ.
mil6.1.6:2.4_1: dasa kāyānugatā dhammā bhave bhave kāyaṁ anudhāvanti anuparivattanti,
mil6.1.6:3.1_1: kena kāraṇena arahato kāye āṇā nappavattati issariyaṁ vā, tattha me kāraṇaṁ brūhī”ti?
mil6.1.6:3.2_2: sabbe te pathaviṁ nissāya caranti viharanti vuttiṁ kappenti, api nu kho, mahārāja,
mil6.1.6:3.2_3: tesaṁ pathaviyā āṇā pavattati issariyaṁ vā”ti?
mil6.1.6:3.4_2: na ca arahato kāye āṇā pavattati issariyaṁ vā”ti.
mil6.1.6:4.1_1: kena kāraṇena puthujjano kāyikampi cetasikampi vedanaṁ vedayatī”ti?
mil6.1.6:4.2_1: cittassa puthujjano kāyikampi cetasikampi vedanaṁ vedayati.
mil6.1.6:4.3_1: goṇo chāto paritasito abaladubbalaparittakatiṇesu vā latāya vā upanibaddho assa,
mil6.1.6:4.4_2: cittaṁ parikupitaṁ kāyaṁ ābhujati nibbhujati samparivattakaṁ karoti.
mil6.1.6:4.5_0: Atha kho so abhāvitacitto tasati ravati bheravarāvamabhiravati, idamettha, mahārāja, kāraṇaṁ,
mil6.1.6:4.5_1: yena kāraṇena puthujjano kāyikampi cetasikampi vedanaṁ vedayatī”ti.
mil6.1.6:5.1_1: yena kāraṇena arahā ekaṁ vedanaṁ vedayati kāyikaṁ, na cetasikan”ti?
mil6.1.6:5.2_1: cittaṁ bhāvitaṁ hoti subhāvitaṁ dantaṁ sudantaṁ assavaṁ vacanakaraṁ,
mil6.1.6:5.2_2: so dukkhāya vedanāya phuṭṭho samāno ‘aniccan’ti daḷhaṁ gaṇhāti,
mil6.1.6:5.2_4: tassa taṁ cittaṁ samādhithambhe upanibandhanaṁ na vedhati na calati, ṭhitaṁ hoti avikkhittaṁ,
mil6.1.6:5.2_5: tassa vedanāvikāravipphārena kāyo ābhujati nibbhujati samparivattati, idamettha, mahārāja, kāraṇaṁ,
mil6.1.6:5.2_6: yena kāraṇena arahā ekaṁ vedanaṁ vedayati kāyikaṁ, na cetasikan”ti.
mil6.1.6:6.1_1: taṁ nāma loke acchariyaṁ yaṁ kāye calamāne cittaṁ na calati, tattha me kāraṇaṁ brūhī”ti.
mil6.1.6:6.4_1: arahā dukkhāya vedanāya phuṭṭho samāno ‘aniccan’ti daḷhaṁ gaṇhāti,
mil6.1.6:6.4_3: tassa taṁ cittaṁ samādhithambhe upanibandhanaṁ na vedhati na calati, ṭhitaṁ hoti avikkhittaṁ,
mil6.1.6:6.4_4: tassa vedanāvikāravipphārena kāyo ābhujati nibbhujati samparivattati,
mil6.1.6:6.4_5: cittaṁ pana tassa na vedhati na calati khandho viya mahārukkhassā”ti.
mil6.1.6:6.5_1: na me evarūpo sabbakāliko dhammapadīpo diṭṭhapubbo”ti.
